title: Brands
content:
A brand is a name, design, or symbol, or combination of any of these, which distinguishes one company's products from another. It's often used to indicate a positive quality or characteristic of a product or service.

Service Management uses brands as part of the resources which help you to efficiently manage your assets and their life cycle. Along with asset model and other information, Service Management details what you need to know about your assets.

Related topics

  • Company Management
  • How to create a brand record
  • How to edit a brand record
  • How to retire a brand record
